## QuotaHit — Feedback Widget Handler v2

**Webhook:** `POST /webhook/feedback-widget`

**Feedback flow:**
1. Check for screenshot → upload to Google Drive
2. Format notification with screenshot URL
3. Send Telegram + Gmail + log to Sheet

**Vote flow:**
1. Log vote to Suggestion Votes sheet

**Screenshot URL format:**
`https://drive.google.com/file/d/{id}/view`

**Fixes (Feb 22):**
- Removed responseMode + Respond nodes (500 error fix)
- Removed Merge node (was blocking downstream nodes)
